an10.94:4.1: Ekaṃ samayaṃ bhagavā campāyaṃ viharati gaggarāya pokkharaṇiyā tīre.
an10.94:4.2: Atha kho vajjiyamāhito gahapati divā divassa campāya nikkhami bhagavantaṃ dassanāya.
an10.94:4.8: Yannūnāhaṃ yena aññatitthiyānaṃ paribbājakānaṃ ārāmo tenupasaṅkameyyan”ti.
an10.94:5.1: Atha kho vajjiyamāhito gahapati yena aññatitthiyānaṃ paribbājakānaṃ ārāmo tenupasaṅkami.
an10.94:5.2: Tena kho pana samayena te aññatitthiyā paribbājakā saṅgamma samāgamma unnādino uccāsaddamahāsaddā anekavihitaṃ tiracchānakathaṃ kathentā nisinnā honti.
an10.94:6.1: Addasaṃsu kho te aññatitthiyā paribbājakā vajjiyamāhitaṃ gahapatiṃ dūratova āgacchantaṃ.
an10.94:6.5: Ayaṃ vajjiyamāhito gahapati āgacchati samaṇassa gotamassa sāvako.
an10.94:6.6: Yāvatā kho pana samaṇassa gotamassa sāvakā gihī odātavasanā campāyaṃ paṭivasanti, ayaṃ tesaṃ aññataro vajjiyamāhito gahapati.
an10.94:6.7: Appasaddakāmā kho pana te āyasmanto appasaddavinītā appasaddassa vaṇṇavādino.
an10.94:6.8: Appeva nāma appasaddaṃ parisaṃ viditvā upasaṅkamitabbaṃ maññeyyā”ti.
an10.94:7.1: Atha kho te aññatitthiyā paribbājakā tuṇhī ahesuṃ.
an10.94:7.2: Atha kho vajjiyamāhito gahapati yena te aññatitthiyā paribbājakā tenupasaṅkami;
an10.94:7.3: upasaṅkamitvā tehi aññatitthiyehi paribbājakehi saddhiṃ sammodi.
an10.94:7.4: Sammodanīyaṃ kathaṃ sāraṇīyaṃ vītisāretvā ekamantaṃ nisīdi.
an10.94:7.5: Ekamantaṃ nisinnaṃ kho vajjiyamāhitaṃ gahapatiṃ te aññatitthiyā paribbājakā etadavocuṃ:
an10.94:7.6: “saccaṃ kira, gahapati, samaṇo gotamo sabbaṃ tapaṃ garahati, sabbaṃ tapassiṃ lūkhājīviṃ ekaṃsena upakkosati upavadatī”ti?
an10.94:7.7: “Na kho, bhante, bhagavā sabbaṃ tapaṃ garahati napi sabbaṃ tapassiṃ lūkhājīviṃ ekaṃsena upakkosati upavadati.
an10.94:7.8: Gārayhaṃ kho, bhante, bhagavā garahati, pasaṃsitabbaṃ pasaṃsati.
an10.94:7.9: Gārayhaṃ kho pana, bhante, bhagavā garahanto pasaṃsitabbaṃ pasaṃsanto vibhajjavādo bhagavā.
an10.94:8.1: Evaṃ vutte, aññataro paribbājako vajjiyamāhitaṃ gahapatiṃ etadavoca:
an10.94:8.2: “āgamehi tvaṃ, gahapati, yassa tvaṃ samaṇassa gotamassa vaṇṇaṃ bhāsati, samaṇo gotamo venayiko appaññattiko”ti?
an10.94:8.6: Iti kusalākusalaṃ bhagavā paññāpayamāno sapaññattiko bhagavā;
an10.94:9.1: Evaṃ vutte te paribbājakā tuṇhībhūtā maṅkubhūtā pattakkhandhā adhomukhā pajjhāyantā appaṭibhānā nisīdiṃsu.
an10.94:9.2: Atha kho vajjiyamāhito gahapati te paribbājake tuṇhībhūte maṅkubhūte pattakkhandhe adhomukhe pajjhāyante appaṭibhāne viditvā uṭṭhāyāsanā yena bhagavā tenupasaṅkami;
an10.94:9.4: Ekamantaṃ nisinno kho vajjiyamāhito gahapati yāvatako ahosi tehi aññatitthiyehi paribbājakehi saddhiṃ kathāsallāpo taṃ sabbaṃ bhagavato ārocesi.
an10.94:10.2: Evaṃ kho te, gahapati, moghapurisā kālena kālaṃ sahadhammena suniggahitaṃ niggahetabbā.
an10.94:10.3: Nāhaṃ, gahapati, sabbaṃ tapaṃ tapitabbanti vadāmi;
an10.94:10.4: na ca panāhaṃ, gahapati, sabbaṃ tapaṃ na tapitabbanti vadāmi;
an10.94:10.5: nāhaṃ, gahapati, sabbaṃ samādānaṃ samāditabbanti vadāmi;
an10.94:10.6: na panāhaṃ, gahapati, sabbaṃ samādānaṃ na samāditabbanti vadāmi;
an10.94:10.7: nāhaṃ, gahapati, sabbaṃ padhānaṃ padahitabbanti vadāmi;
an10.94:10.8: na panāhaṃ, gahapati, sabbaṃ padhānaṃ na padahitabbanti vadāmi;
an10.94:10.9: nāhaṃ, gahapati, sabbo paṭinissaggo paṭinissajjitabboti vadāmi.
an10.94:10.10: Na panāhaṃ, gahapati, sabbo paṭinissaggo na paṭinissajjitabboti vadāmi;
an10.94:10.11: nāhaṃ, gahapati, sabbā vimutti vimuccitabbāti vadāmi;
an10.94:10.12: na panāhaṃ, gahapati, sabbā vimutti na vimuccitabbāti vadāmi.
an10.94:11.1: Yañhi, gahapati, tapaṃ tapato akusalā dhammā abhivaḍḍhanti, kusalā dhammā parihāyanti, evarūpaṃ tapaṃ na tapitabbanti vadāmi.
an10.94:11.2: Yañca khvassa, gahapati, tapaṃ tapato akusalā dhammā parihāyanti, kusalā dhammā abhivaḍḍhanti, evarūpaṃ tapaṃ tapitabbanti vadāmi.
an10.94:12.1: Yañhi, gahapati, samādānaṃ samādiyato akusalā dhammā abhivaḍḍhanti, kusalā dhammā parihāyanti, evarūpaṃ samādānaṃ na samāditabbanti vadāmi.
an10.94:12.2: Yañca khvassa, gahapati, samādānaṃ samādiyato akusalā dhammā parihāyanti, kusalā dhammā abhivaḍḍhanti, evarūpaṃ samādānaṃ samāditabbanti vadāmi.
an10.94:13.1: Yañhi, gahapati, padhānaṃ padahato akusalā dhammā abhivaḍḍhanti, kusalā dhammā parihāyanti, evarūpaṃ padhānaṃ na padahitabbanti vadāmi.
an10.94:13.2: Yañca khvassa, gahapati, padhānaṃ padahato akusalā dhammā parihāyanti kusalā dhammā abhivaḍḍhanti, evarūpaṃ padhānaṃ padahitabbanti vadāmi.
an10.94:14.1: Yañhi, gahapati, paṭinissaggaṃ paṭinissajjato akusalā dhammā abhivaḍḍhanti, kusalā dhammā parihāyanti, evarūpo paṭinissaggo na paṭinissajjitabboti vadāmi.
an10.94:14.2: Yañca khvassa, gahapati, paṭinissaggaṃ paṭinissajjato akusalā dhammā parihāyanti, kusalā dhammā abhivaḍḍhanti, evarūpo paṭinissaggo paṭinissajjitabboti vadāmi.
an10.94:15.1: Yañhi, gahapati, vimuttiṃ vimuccato akusalā dhammā abhivaḍḍhanti, kusalā dhammā parihāyanti, evarūpā vimutti na vimuccitabbāti vadāmi.
an10.94:15.2: Yañca khvassa, gahapati, vimuttiṃ vimuccato akusalā dhammā parihāyanti, kusalā dhammā abhivaḍḍhanti, evarūpā vimutti vimuccitabbāti vadāmī”ti.
an10.94:16.1: Atha kho vajjiyamāhito gahapati bhagavatā dhammiyā kathāya sandassito samādapito samuttejito sampahaṃsito uṭṭhāyāsanā bhagavantaṃ abhivādetvā padakkhiṇaṃ katvā pakkāmi.
an10.94:17.1: Atha kho bhagavā acirapakkante vajjiyamāhite gahapatimhi bhikkhū āmantesi:
an10.94:17.2: “yopi so, bhikkhave, bhikkhu dīgharattaṃ apparajakkho imasmiṃ dhammavinaye, sopi evamevaṃ aññatitthiye paribbājake sahadhammena suniggahitaṃ niggaṇheyya yathā taṃ vajjiyamāhitena gahapatinā niggahitā”ti.
